title: Lemon Ice Lost Mary Tappo Prefilled Pods
description: Lost Mary Tappo Lemon Ice Pre-filled Replacement Pods are a light, zesty blend of sweet and tangy lemon that has been paired with a blast of bracing ice to create a soothing sensation with every inhale. This is a citrusy flavour with a cool, calming vibe. The pack of Lost Mary Tappo pods boasts 2 2ml replacement pods that have been loaded with nicotine salt vape juice in a 2% (20mg) nicotine strength for customer satisfaction and convenience. The Lost Mary Tappo pods are only compatible with the Tappo Pod Kit by Lost Mary , and shouldnâ€™t be used alongside other vape devices . Each of the Tappo replacement pods is capable of lasting up to 600 puffs each before - after a maximum of 600 puffs the Tappo Lost Mary pod will need to be discarded and replaced. As the Lost Mary Tappo pre-filled pods are available as a pack of two, they allow customers to enjoy up to 1200 puffs in total. The Lost Mary pods are a cheaper, more sustainable alternative to disposable vapes and offer vapers more puffs for their money. The Lost Mary Tappo replacement pods are available in more than 25 different flavours , with each based on the same popular flavours as the best selling BM600 disposable vapes - there are also new flavours still being released! Lost Mary Tappo Flavours: Apple Watermelon Banana Ice Blue Razz Blue Sour Raspberry Cherry Cola Cherry Ice Double Apple Grape Kiwi PassionFruit Guava Lemon Ice Lemon and Lime Maryturbo Mix Berries Peach Ice Pineapple Ice Pineapple PassionFruit Lemon Red Cherry Silky Tobacco Spearmint Strawberry Ice Strawberry Raspberry Triple Mango Tropical Fruit USA Mix Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Features: Flavour : Lemon, Ice, Cool Pod Capacity : 2ml Nicotine Strength : 20mg (2%) Nicotine Type : Nicotine Salts TPD Compliant Prefilled Pods Compatible with Lost Mary Tappo Pod Kit Lost Mary Tappo Package Contains: 2x Lost Mary Tappo Lemon Ice Pre-filled Replacement Pods
